title: Ok GD Art Thread I promised.
body:
Took out stream link will put back later. usually every account thats named besteau is mine.

Knatt will be joining me cause its his day off too. Anyone else wanna join in and make it an art jerk go ahead!

Also I apologize for shit voice I'm sick as hell. 

Themes:
A champion in another champions armor. (Request two different champions, second champion will be the armor fusion.)
League cuties style. [League cuties style](https://40.media.tumblr.com/aed7c84ced776b55b1b0331dd356cefe/tumblr_nvlh7k3ERr1uxiyfto1_540.png)

Knatt will do character fusions and League "uglies" (10 min limit)

**Taking an hour nap because i'm feeling like poodiddy. Will start thread again later**
